seriesJson.title: Los Angeles Philharmonic
seriesJson.description: This series features concert performances by the Los Angeles Philharmonic orchestra.

node.title: Aaron Copland and the American West, part 1
node.description: Performances of Aaron Copland's Fanfare For The Common Man and the Third Symphony. Following the performance, an interview with Carl L. Sackett, a "frontiersman," is included.
